psychic energy. This breaks the effects of Reflect
and Light Screen. Contact.
psychicfangs.shortDesc:
The user bites the target with fangs imbued with
psychic energy. This breaks the effects of Reflect
and Light Screen. Contact.
psychicfangs.name: Psychic Fangs

stompingtantrum.desc:
Driven by frustration, the user stomps the ground
around itself. If the user’s previous move has
failed or missed, this damage doubles. Can't miss.
stompingtantrum.shortDesc:
Driven by frustration, the user stomps the ground
around itself. If the user’s previous move has
failed or missed, this damage doubles. Can't miss.
stompingtantrum.name: Stomping Tantrum

shadowbone.desc:
The user attacks by beating the target with a bone
imbued with spirits. This ALWAYS drops
defense, ALWAYS flinches and has +4 Priority.
shadowbone.shortDesc:
The user attacks by beating the target with a bone
imbued with spirits. This ALWAYS drops
defense, ALWAYS flinches and has +4 Priority.
shadowbone.name: Shadow Bone

accelerock.desc:
The user smashes into the target at high speed with
it's rocky body. This has +1 priority, and can't
miss. Contact.
accelerock.shortDesc:
The user smashes into the target at high speed with
it's rocky body. This has +1 priority, and can't
miss. Contact.
accelerock.name: Accelerock

liquidation.desc:
The user pummels the target using a full-force blast
of water. This lowers Defense 25% of the time.
Contact.
liquidation.shortDesc:
The user pummels the target using a full-force blast
of water. This lowers Defense 25% of the time.
Contact.
liquidation.name: Liquidation

radiantoutburst.name: Radiant Outburst
radiantoutburst.desc:
The user unleashes a destructive, yet beautiful blast
of colorful light and energy. This drops the user's
Sp. Atk stat by 4 (or 2/3) after use, however.
radiantoutburst.shortDesc:
The user unleashes a destructive, yet beautiful blast
of colorful light and energy. This drops the user's
Sp. Atk stat by 4 (or 2/3) after use, however.

spectralthief.desc:
The user hides in the shadows, and strikes. This
steals any stat boosts the target has, then attacks.
Ignores Protect and Substitute. Can't miss. Contact.
spectralthief.shortDesc:
The user hides in the shadows, and strikes. This
steals any stat boosts the target has, then attacks.
Ignores Protect and Substitute. Can't miss. Contact.
spectralthief.name: Spectral Thief

solarstrike.name: Solar Strike
solarstrike.desc:
The user flies up and descends onto the target with
a column of flames. ALWAYS crits, ALWAYS burns, and
deals 30% recoil to the user. Contact.
solarstrike.shortDesc:
The user flies up and descends onto the target with
a column of flames. ALWAYS crits, ALWAYS burns, and
deals 30% recoil to the user. Contact.

spectralbeam.name: Spectral Beam
spectralbeam.desc:
The user blasts the target with a devastating,
shadowy beam. This move ignores the target's Ability.
This lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2 after use.
spectralbeam.shortDesc:
The user blasts the target with a devastating,
shadowy beam. This move ignores the target's Ability.
This lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2 after use.

tearfullook.desc:
The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose
its combative spirit. This lowers both offensive stats
by 1. Z-Effect +3 Accuracy. BYPASSES PROTECT.
tearfullook.shortDesc:
The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose
its combative spirit. This lowers both offensive stats
by 1. Z-Effect +3 Accuracy. BYPASSES PROTECT.
tearfullook.name: Tearful Look

zingzap.desc:
The user swiftly and nimbly strikes the target.
This has a 30% chance to flinch, and ALWAYS boosts
the user's Speed by 1 after use. Contact.
zingzap.shortDesc:
The user swiftly and nimbly strikes the target.
This has a 30% chance to flinch, and ALWAYS boosts
the user's Speed by 1 after use. Contact.
zingzap.name: Zing Zap

cosmicchaos.name: Cosmic Chaos
cosmicchaos.desc:
The user staggers the foe with cosmic energy
This attack will ALWAYS flinch the foe, and go first.
This halves the foe's current HP stat.
cosmicchaos.shortDesc:
The user staggers the foe with cosmic energy
This attack will ALWAYS flinch the foe, and go first.
This halves the foe's current HP stat.

multiattack.desc:
The user slashes at the foe, cloaked in energy.
This move's type changes with the user's held Memory.
This ALWAYS drops the foe's Defense by 1. Contact.
multiattack.shortDesc:
The user slashes at the foe, cloaked in energy.
This move's type changes with the user's held Memory.
This ALWAYS drops the foe's Defense by 1. Contact.
multiattack.name: Multi-Attack

10000000voltthunderbolt.desc:
The user, Pikachu wearing a cap, powers up a jolt of
electricity using its Z-Power and unleashes it.
ALWAYS CRITS AND ALWAYS PARAS.
10000000voltthunderbolt.shortDesc:
The user, Pikachu wearing a cap, powers up a jolt of
electricity using its Z-Power and unleashes it.
ALWAYS CRITS AND ALWAYS PARAS.
10000000voltthunderbolt.name: 10,000,000 Volt Thunderbolt

mindblown.desc:
Blacephalon attacks everything around it by blowing
up it's own head for amusement. This will ALWAYS
flinch the opponent, in exchange for losing 50% HP.
mindblown.shortDesc:
Blacephalon attacks everything around it by blowing
up it's own head for amusement. This will ALWAYS
flinch the opponent, in exchange for losing 50% HP.
mindblown.name: Mind Blown

plasmashot.name: Plasma Shot
plasmashot.desc:
The user fires an intense blast of superheated plasma.
This ALWAYS burns the target, and turns Normal type
moves to Electric type moves for the rest of the turn.
plasmashot.shortDesc:
The user fires an intense blast of superheated plasma.
This ALWAYS burns the target, and turns Normal type
moves to Electric type moves for the rest of the turn.

twilightcannon.name: Twilight Cannon
twilightcannon.desc:
The user unleashed a wicked beam of dark energy. This
is Physical or Special, based on the user's higher
stat, & drops offensive stats by 2. IGNORES ABILITIES.
twilightcannon.shortDesc:
The user unleashed a wicked beam of dark energy. This
is Physical or Special, based on the user's higher
stat, & drops offensive stats by 2. IGNORES ABILITIES.

lightthatburnsthesky.desc:
This attack inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage,
whichever stat is higher for the user 
This move ignores the target’s Ability.
lightthatburnsthesky.shortDesc:
This attack inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage,
whichever stat is higher for the user 
This move ignores the target’s Ability.
lightthatburnsthesky.name: Light That Burns the Sky
lightthatburnsthesky.fullname: move: Light That Burns the Sky

searingsunrazesmash.desc:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Solgaleo,
attacks the target with full force. This move can
ignore the effect of the target’s Ability.
searingsunrazesmash.shortDesc:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Solgaleo,

letssnuggleforever.desc:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mimikyu,

After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mimikyu,

After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lycanroc,

After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Kommo-o,

gives +1 all stats in exchange for 30% recoil.
